story:
La Compañía de Producción 

My Dreams to Reality (MDTR)

 

ENGLISH VERSION
(Spanish and French below)

 

The Production Company
 

 

At ‘My Dreams to Reality (MDTR)’ we like to try and do just that!  Help springboard aspiring talent, no matter what age, size or race, amateur or professional alike, to achieve their dreams! 

The Dream:
Ultimately, we want to produce a magnificent rock opera called ‘ATYLANTOS’ which is the idea of the gifted writer and composer, Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE.  Based on ‘A Legend of Atlantis’ which was originally an opera, as some of you may remember, the recording of this rock opera will be unique!  It will involve the re-arrangement and compilation of two of Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE’s already completed albums, ‘Atylantos’ and ‘Carmine Meo’, which sold over 2 million copies!

When we saw CRISTINA RAMOS on ‘Spain’s got Talent’, she blew us away and reinforced our belief that Rock Opera could work well.  In our opinion, Cristina has not only an outstanding voice, but one that is exceptionally versatile, with the range to shatter glass and smoothly transition in an instant to the complete opposite end of the scale.   Naturally, she has a voice as pure and golden as an angel, but can easily change that voice and persona to be that of heavy rock - a great performer! 

It made sense to combine the dreams of these two gifted people and has become the first stage of this ambitious project.  We thoroughly believe that Cristina Ramos will become an International Super-Star and that the creation of Jean-Patrick Capdevielle’s ‘ATYLANTOS’, will be the perfect vehicle to help demonstrate her supreme ability.  As an outstanding artist, Cristina is perfect for the main female role in ATYLANTOS and the Single and Video Clip, for which we plan to use the crowd funding, will be specifically adapted to clearly display her amazing talent.  A further four singers of the same type as Cristina will be required for stage two – the double album, and stage three - the Rock Opera Show.  

The funding at this first stage is fundamental to the success of this project, but once created, the single and video clip will be the ideal stepping stones that will lead us to the album and then to our overall aim, the Show, ATYLANTOS in 2018… which must go on!

So how can we make this happen? 

MDTR is a global entertainment production and management company that strives to help people achieve their dreams in: Live Events, Music, Dancing, Acting, Television, Films, Documentaries, Visual Arts, Fashion and General Entertainment.  As experienced Artists ourselves, we understand how the industry works and let us assure you, we have the Artists’ interests at heart in every way.  There are dedicated teams in place for each project category who have much experience in Artist Management, Major Record Labels, TV, Film Productions and International Promoters, some of whom have worked with the biggest names in the industry.   

Budget:

To be successful at this first stage we would need to achieve £60,000 GBP which is the recording budget of the single and the video clip.  This cost includes the payment of: Musicians, Artistic Director, Musical Arranger, the Sound Engineer, the Photographic, Video and Editing Teams, Hairdresser, Make-Up Artist and Marketing Staff. It also includes the cost of the audio studio in Paris and video studio in London - Elstree, the equipment, and the pressing of the single and its distribution.  In addition, there are also the various transport costs of the Team, and accommodation each day.   

Thank you in anticipation of your kind contributions:

We hope you will consider this to be a worthwhile project and will give generously, not only for Cristina Ramos as a fabulous artist that really deserves to realize her dreams, but also for the talented Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE’S long-term dream of ATYLANTOS, 2018.  It would be fantastic to be able to realize two dreams in one and would also be a massive plus for the International Arts Community that gives so many people pleasure in rare times of relaxation.

We know we’re being ambitious, but in a World that is sometimes scary, uncertain and seemingly falling apart, this project brings nationalities together, supporting one another, providing extra employment for talented individuals across the world and really demonstrates the unity that can be experienced when we help one another to achieve, no matter what our background or beliefs. 

There are millions on social networks that already appreciate the talent of Cristina Ramos, winner of ‘Spain’s got Talent 2016’.  So we hope that, if you are able, you can contribute a small amount to our project and share this project with all your friends on social media and help us bring a piece of this beautiful puzzle together…

All contributions are gratefully received, no matter how small – every little helps!  We hope you will feel it worthwhile to help ‘My Dreams to Reality’ bring Cristina’s and Jean-Patrick’s dreams to reality (any amount in surplus of the total required for this first stage will be transferred to help fund the second stage – the Double Album!)!

TO THOSE OF YOU THAT KNOW US ALREADY..

AN ENORMOUS THANK YOU TO YOU ALL

FOR YOUR CONTINUED  LOYALTY AND SUPPORT

For further information please contact: gogo1a@mydreamstoreality.com

 

VERSION EN ESPANOL

La Compañía: My Dreams to Reality (MDTR):

 

En 'My Dreams To Reality (MDTR)' nos gusta tratar de hacer precisamente eso! ¡Ayude los muevos talentos, no importa qué edad, tamaño o raza, amateur o profesional, para lograr sus sueños!

El sueño:
En definitiva, queremos producir una magnífica ópera de rock llamada ATYLANTOS, que es la idea del talentoso escritor y compositor, Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE. Basado en 'A Legend of Atlantis' que fue originalmente una ópera, como algunos de ustedes pueden recordar, la grabación de esta ópera rock será única! Incluirá el reordenamiento y la compilación de dos álbumes ya completados de Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE, 'Atylantos' y 'Carmine Meo', que vendió más de 2 millones de copias.

Cuando vimos a CRISTINA RAMOS en 'Spain's got Talent', nos sopló y reforzó nuestra creencia de que este Rock Opera podría funcionar bien. En nuestra opinión, Cristina no solo tiene una voz sobresaliente, sino que es excepcionalmente versátil, con el rango de romper vidrio y suavemente transición en un instante al extremo opuesto de la escala. Naturalmente, ella tiene una voz tan pura y dorada como un ángel, pero puede cambiar fácilmente esa voz y persona a ser la de rock pesado - un gran intérprete!

Tenía sentido combinar los sueños de estas dos personas dotadas y se ha convertido en la primera etapa de este ambicioso proyecto. Creemos firmemente que Cristina Ramos se convertirá en una Super Estrella Internacional y que la creación de ATYLANTOS de Jean-Patrick Capdevielle será el vehículo perfecto para demostrar su suprema habilidad. Como artista sobresaliente, Cristina es perfecta para el papel femenino principal en ATYLANTOS y el Single y Video Clip, para lo cual planeamos utilizar el financiamiento de público, será específicamente adaptado para mostrar claramente su increíble talento. Otros cuatro cantantes del mismo tipo que Cristina serán requeridos para la segunda etapa - el doble álbum, y la tercera - el Rock Opera Show.

El financiamiento en esta primera etapa es fundamental para el éxito de este proyecto, pero una vez creado, el single y el videoclip serán los trampolines ideales que nos llevarán al álbum y luego a nuestro objetivo global, el Show, ATYLANTOS en 2018 ... que debe continuar!

Entonces, ¿cómo podemos hacer que esto suceda?
MDTR es una compañía global de producción y gestión de entretenimiento que se esfuerza por ayudar a la gente a alcanzar sus sueños en: Eventos en Vivo, Música, Baile, Actuación, Televisión, Películas, Documentales, Artes Visuales, Moda y Entretenimiento General. Como artistas experimentados nosotros mismos, entendemos cómo funciona la industria y les aseguramos, tenemos los intereses de los artistas en el corazón en todos los sentidos. Existen equipos dedicados para cada categoría de proyecto que tienen mucha experiencia en Gestión de Artistas, Grandes Etiquetas de Grabación, TV, Producciones Cinematográficas y Promotores Internacionales, algunos de los cuales han trabajado con los nombres más importantes de la industria.

Presupuesto:
Para tener éxito en esta primera etapa tendríamos que conseguir £60,000 GBP, que es el presupuesto de grabación del single y el video clip. Este costo incluye el pago de: Mùsicos, Directora Artística, Arreglista Musical, Ingeniero de Sonido, Equipos Fotográficos, Video y Editores, Peluquería, Maquilladora y Personal de Marketing. También incluye el coste del estudio de audio en París y el estudio de vídeo en Londres - Elstree, el equipo, y el prensado del single y su distribución. Además, también hay los diversos costos de transporte del equipo, y el alojamiento cada día.

Gracias en la anticipación de sus contribuciones amables:
Esperamos que considere este proyecto como un proyecto valioso y le dará generosamente, no sólo a Cristina Ramos como una artista fabulosa que realmente merece realizar sus sueños, sino también para el talentoso sueño de Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE de ATYLANTOS, 2018.

Sabemos que estamos siendo ambiciosos, pero en un mundo que a veces es atemorizante, incierto y aparentemente en descomposición, este proyecto reúne a las nacionalidades, apoyándose mutuamente, proporcionando empleo adicional a personas con talento en todo el mundo y realmente demuestra la unidad que puede ser Experimentado cuando nos ayudamos unos a otros para lograr, no importa lo que nuestros antecedentes o creencias.

Hay millones en las redes sociales que ya aprecian el talento de Cristina Ramos, ganadora de 'Spain's Talent 2016'. Así que esperamos que, si eres capaz, puedes aportar una pequeña cantidad a nuestro proyecto y compartir este proyecto con todos tus amigos en las redes sociales y ayudarnos a traer una pieza de este hermoso rompecabezas juntos ...

Todas las contribuciones se reciben con gratitud, no importa lo pequeño - cada poco ayuda! Esperamos que valga la pena ayudar a 'Mis sueños a la realidad' a hacer realidad los sueños de Cristina y Jean-Patrick (cualquier monto en exceso del total requerido para esta primera etapa será transferido para ayudar a financiar la segunda etapa - el álbum doble


A LOS DE USTED QUE Nos conocen ya.
UN GRAN GRACIAS A TODOS
PARA SU FIDELIDAD Y SOPORTE CONTINUA

Para más información, póngase en contacto con: gogo1a@mydreamstoreality.com

 

VERSION FRANÇAISE

L'entreprise: My Dreams to Reality (MDTR)

 

Dans "My Dreams to Reality (MDTR)" voila notre philosophie : Aider les nouveaux talents, quels que soient leur âge, leur aspect ou leur origine, amateurs ou professionnels, pour réaliser leurs rêves!

Le rêve:
En fin de compte, nous voulons produire un magnifique opéra rock appelé "ATYLANTOS" qui est l'idée de l'auteur- compositeur, Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE. Basé sur  "Une légende de l'Atlantide" qui était à l'origine un opéra, comme certains d'entre vous peuvent s'en rappeler, l'enregistrement de cet opéra rock sera unique! Il impliquera le réarrangement et la compilation de deux des albums déjà achevés de Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE, "Atylantos" et "Carmine Meo", qui ont été vendus à plus de 2 millions d'exemplaires!

Quand nous avons vu CRISTINA RAMOS  sur "Got Talent Espagne", elle nous a littéralement soufflés et cela a renforcé notre conviction que cet Opera-Rock pourrait bien fonctionner. À notre avis, Cristina a non seulement une voix exceptionnelle à "briser les verres en cristal", alliée à la faculté de basculer instantanément dans un registre Rock avec tout autant de talent.

Une grande interprète!

Il était logique de combiner les rêves de ces deux personnes douées. Ce qui est devenu la première étape de ce projet ambitieux.

Nous sommes convaincus que Cristina Ramos deviendra une Super Star internationale et que la création de ATYLANTOS de Jean-Patrick Capdevielle sera le vecteur idéal pour démontrer sa capacité suprême. En tant qu'artiste remarquable, Cristina est parfaite pour le rôle féminin principal dans le futur clip-vidéo ATYLANTOS  pour lequel nous prévoyons d'utiliser le financement coopératif. Quatre autres chanteurs du même type que Cristina seront nécessaires pour la deuxième étape : le double album et la troisième : l'Opéra_Rock.

Le financement à cette première étape est fondamental pour le succès de ce projet. Une fois créé, le clip-vidéo sera le tremplin idéal qui nous mènera à l'album et ensuite à notre objectif ultime, le Spectacle ATYLANTOS en 2018 ... !

Alors, comment pouvons-nous faire cela?
MDTR est une société mondiale de production et de gestion de divertissement qui s'efforce d'aider les gens à réaliser leurs rêves en: événements en direct, musique, danse, télévision, films, documentaires, arts visuels, mode et divertissement en général. En tant qu'experts artistes nous-mêmes, nous comprenons comment fonctionne l'industrie et laissez-nous vous assurer, nous avons à coeur les intérêts des artistes dans tous les domaines.Il y a des équipes dédiées en place pour chaque catégorie de projet qui ont beaucoup d'expérience dans la gestion d'artiste, les grands labels de disque, la télévision, les productions de film et les promoteurs internationaux, dont certains ont travaillé avec les plus grands noms dans l'industrie.

Budget:
Pour réussir cette première étape, nous aurions besoin d'atteindre £60,000 GBP qui est le budget d'enregistrement du single et du clip vidéo. Ce prix inclut les salaires : des musiciens, du directeur artistique, de l'arrangeur musical, de l'ingénieur du son, des équipes de photographie, de vidéo et de montage, coiffeur, maquilleur et personnel de marketing. Il inclut également le coût du studio audio à Paris et studio vidéo à Londres - Elstree, l'équipement, et le pressage du single et de sa distribution. En outre, il y a aussi les frais de transport différents de l'équipe, ainsi que la restauration et l'hébergement.

Merci d'avance de vos aimables contributions :
Nous espérons que vous considérerez cela comme un projet intéressant et que vous serez très nombreux à y contribuer, non seulement pour Cristina Ramos une fabuleuse artiste qui mérite vraiment de réaliser ses rêves, mais aussi pour "ATYLANTOS" cette merveilleuse création musicale rêvée et écrite par Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE. Il serait fantastique de pouvoir réaliser ces deux rêves en un seul en 2018. 
Nous savons que nous sommes ambitieux, mais dans un monde parfois effrayant, incertain et prêt à tous moments à imploser, ce projet rassemble les nationalités, propose des opportunités supplémentaires à des personnes talentueuses à travers le monde et démontre surtout que l'unité  est réalisable quand tout le monde y apporte sa "petite pierre".

Il y a des millions de fans sur les réseaux sociaux qui apprécient déjà le talent de Cristina Ramos, vainqueur de "GotTalent 2016 Espagne". Nous espérons donc que, si vous le pouvez, vous contribuerez un peu à notre projet et que vous le partagerez avec tous vos amis sur les réseaux sociaux en apportant ainsi votre petite pièce dans ce magnifique puzzle ...

Toutes les contributions, même modestes, sont les bienvenues !

 Nous espérons que vous apprécierez les rêves de Cristina et Jean-Patrick (tous les montants excédant le total requis pour cette première étape seront transférés pour aider à financer la deuxième étape - le Double Album !) 



A VOUS TOUS ..
UN ÉNORME MERCI 
POUR VOTRE FIDÉLITÉ ET VOTRE SOUTIEN CONTINU

Pour plus d'informations, veuillez contacter: gogo1a@mydreamstoreality.com
story_txt: La Compañía de Producción My Dreams to Reality (MDTR) ENGLISH VERSION(Spanish and French below) The Production Company  At ‘My Dreams to Reality (MDTR)’ we like to try and do just that!  Help springboard aspiring talent, no matter what age, size or race, amateur or professional alike, to achieve their dreams! The Dream:Ultimately, we want to produce a magnificent rock opera called ‘ATYLANTOS’ which is the idea of the gifted writer and composer, Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE.  Based on ‘A Legend of Atlantis’ which was originally an opera, as some of you may remember, the recording of this rock opera will be unique!  It will involve the re-arrangement and compilation of two of Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE’s already completed albums, ‘Atylantos’ and ‘Carmine Meo’, which sold over 2 million copies!When we saw CRISTINA RAMOS on ‘Spain’s got Talent’, she blew us away and reinforced our belief that Rock Opera could work well.  In our opinion, Cristina has not only an outstanding voice, but one that is exceptionally versatile, with the range to shatter glass and smoothly transition in an instant to the complete opposite end of the scale.   Naturally, she has a voice as pure and golden as an angel, but can easily change that voice and persona to be that of heavy rock - a great performer! It made sense to combine the dreams of these two gifted people and has become the first stage of this ambitious project.  We thoroughly believe that Cristina Ramos will become an International Super-Star and that the creation of Jean-Patrick Capdevielle’s ‘ATYLANTOS’, will be the perfect vehicle to help demonstrate her supreme ability.  As an outstanding artist, Cristina is perfect for the main female role in ATYLANTOS and the Single and Video Clip, for which we plan to use the crowd funding, will be specifically adapted to clearly display her amazing talent.  A further four singers of the same type as Cristina will be required for stage two – the double album, and stage three - the Rock Opera Show.  The funding at this first stage is fundamental to the success of this project, but once created, the single and video clip will be the ideal stepping stones that will lead us to the album and then to our overall aim, the Show, ATYLANTOS in 2018… which must go on!So how can we make this happen?  MDTR is a global entertainment production and management company that strives to help people achieve their dreams in: Live Events, Music, Dancing, Acting, Television, Films, Documentaries, Visual Arts, Fashion and General Entertainment.  As experienced Artists ourselves, we understand how the industry works and let us assure you, we have the Artists’ interests at heart in every way.  There are dedicated teams in place for each project category who have much experience in Artist Management, Major Record Labels, TV, Film Productions and International Promoters, some of whom have worked with the biggest names in the industry.   Budget:To be successful at this first stage we would need to achieve £60,000 GBP which is the recording budget of the single and the video clip.  This cost includes the payment of: Musicians, Artistic Director, Musical Arranger, the Sound Engineer, the Photographic, Video and Editing Teams, Hairdresser, Make-Up Artist and Marketing Staff. It also includes the cost of the audio studio in Paris and video studio in London - Elstree, the equipment, and the pressing of the single and its distribution.  In addition, there are also the various transport costs of the Team, and accommodation each day.   Thank you in anticipation of your kind contributions:We hope you will consider this to be a worthwhile project and will give generously, not only for Cristina Ramos as a fabulous artist that really deserves to realize her dreams, but also for the talented Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE’S long-term dream of ATYLANTOS, 2018.  It would be fantastic to be able to realize two dreams in one and would also be a massive plus for the International Arts Community that gives so many people pleasure in rare times of relaxation.We know we’re being ambitious, but in a World that is sometimes scary, uncertain and seemingly falling apart, this project brings nationalities together, supporting one another, providing extra employment for talented individuals across the world and really demonstrates the unity that can be experienced when we help one another to achieve, no matter what our background or beliefs. There are millions on social networks that already appreciate the talent of Cristina Ramos, winner of ‘Spain’s got Talent 2016’.  So we hope that, if you are able, you can contribute a small amount to our project and share this project with all your friends on social media and help us bring a piece of this beautiful puzzle together…All contributions are gratefully received, no matter how small – every little helps!  We hope you will feel it worthwhile to help ‘My Dreams to Reality’ bring Cristina’s and Jean-Patrick’s dreams to reality (any amount in surplus of the total required for this first stage will be transferred to help fund the second stage – the Double Album!)!TO THOSE OF YOU THAT KNOW US ALREADY..AN ENORMOUS THANK YOU TO YOU ALL FOR YOUR CONTINUED  LOYALTY AND SUPPORTFor further information please contact: gogo1a@mydreamstoreality.com VERSION EN ESPANOLLa Compañía: My Dreams to Reality (MDTR): En 'My Dreams To Reality (MDTR)' nos gusta tratar de hacer precisamente eso! ¡Ayude los muevos talentos, no importa qué edad, tamaño o raza, amateur o profesional, para lograr sus sueños!El sueño:En definitiva, queremos producir una magnífica ópera de rock llamada ATYLANTOS, que es la idea del talentoso escritor y compositor, Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE. Basado en 'A Legend of Atlantis' que fue originalmente una ópera, como algunos de ustedes pueden recordar, la grabación de esta ópera rock será única! Incluirá el reordenamiento y la compilación de dos álbumes ya completados de Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE, 'Atylantos' y 'Carmine Meo', que vendió más de 2 millones de copias.Cuando vimos a CRISTINA RAMOS en 'Spain's got Talent', nos sopló y reforzó nuestra creencia de que este Rock Opera podría funcionar bien. En nuestra opinión, Cristina no solo tiene una voz sobresaliente, sino que es excepcionalmente versátil, con el rango de romper vidrio y suavemente transición en un instante al extremo opuesto de la escala. Naturalmente, ella tiene una voz tan pura y dorada como un ángel, pero puede cambiar fácilmente esa voz y persona a ser la de rock pesado - un gran intérprete!Tenía sentido combinar los sueños de estas dos personas dotadas y se ha convertido en la primera etapa de este ambicioso proyecto. Creemos firmemente que Cristina Ramos se convertirá en una Super Estrella Internacional y que la creación de ATYLANTOS de Jean-Patrick Capdevielle será el vehículo perfecto para demostrar su suprema habilidad. Como artista sobresaliente, Cristina es perfecta para el papel femenino principal en ATYLANTOS y el Single y Video Clip, para lo cual planeamos utilizar el financiamiento de público, será específicamente adaptado para mostrar claramente su increíble talento. Otros cuatro cantantes del mismo tipo que Cristina serán requeridos para la segunda etapa - el doble álbum, y la tercera - el Rock Opera Show.El financiamiento en esta primera etapa es fundamental para el éxito de este proyecto, pero una vez creado, el single y el videoclip serán los trampolines ideales que nos llevarán al álbum y luego a nuestro objetivo global, el Show, ATYLANTOS en 2018 ... que debe continuar!Entonces, ¿cómo podemos hacer que esto suceda?MDTR es una compañía global de producción y gestión de entretenimiento que se esfuerza por ayudar a la gente a alcanzar sus sueños en: Eventos en Vivo, Música, Baile, Actuación, Televisión, Películas, Documentales, Artes Visuales, Moda y Entretenimiento General. Como artistas experimentados nosotros mismos, entendemos cómo funciona la industria y les aseguramos, tenemos los intereses de los artistas en el corazón en todos los sentidos. Existen equipos dedicados para cada categoría de proyecto que tienen mucha experiencia en Gestión de Artistas, Grandes Etiquetas de Grabación, TV, Producciones Cinematográficas y Promotores Internacionales, algunos de los cuales han trabajado con los nombres más importantes de la industria.Presupuesto:Para tener éxito en esta primera etapa tendríamos que conseguir £60,000 GBP, que es el presupuesto de grabación del single y el video clip. Este costo incluye el pago de: Mùsicos, Directora Artística, Arreglista Musical, Ingeniero de Sonido, Equipos Fotográficos, Video y Editores, Peluquería, Maquilladora y Personal de Marketing. También incluye el coste del estudio de audio en París y el estudio de vídeo en Londres - Elstree, el equipo, y el prensado del single y su distribución. Además, también hay los diversos costos de transporte del equipo, y el alojamiento cada día.Gracias en la anticipación de sus contribuciones amables:Esperamos que considere este proyecto como un proyecto valioso y le dará generosamente, no sólo a Cristina Ramos como una artista fabulosa que realmente merece realizar sus sueños, sino también para el talentoso sueño de Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE de ATYLANTOS, 2018.Sabemos que estamos siendo ambiciosos, pero en un mundo que a veces es atemorizante, incierto y aparentemente en descomposición, este proyecto reúne a las nacionalidades, apoyándose mutuamente, proporcionando empleo adicional a personas con talento en todo el mundo y realmente demuestra la unidad que puede ser Experimentado cuando nos ayudamos unos a otros para lograr, no importa lo que nuestros antecedentes o creencias.Hay millones en las redes sociales que ya aprecian el talento de Cristina Ramos, ganadora de 'Spain's Talent 2016'. Así que esperamos que, si eres capaz, puedes aportar una pequeña cantidad a nuestro proyecto y compartir este proyecto con todos tus amigos en las redes sociales y ayudarnos a traer una pieza de este hermoso rompecabezas juntos ...Todas las contribuciones se reciben con gratitud, no importa lo pequeño - cada poco ayuda! Esperamos que valga la pena ayudar a 'Mis sueños a la realidad' a hacer realidad los sueños de Cristina y Jean-Patrick (cualquier monto en exceso del total requerido para esta primera etapa será transferido para ayudar a financiar la segunda etapa - el álbum dobleA LOS DE USTED QUE Nos conocen ya.UN GRAN GRACIAS A TODOSPARA SU FIDELIDAD Y SOPORTE CONTINUAPara más información, póngase en contacto con: gogo1a@mydreamstoreality.com VERSION FRANÇAISEL'entreprise: My Dreams to Reality (MDTR) Dans "My Dreams to Reality (MDTR)" voila notre philosophie : Aider les nouveaux talents, quels que soient leur âge, leur aspect ou leur origine, amateurs ou professionnels, pour réaliser leurs rêves!Le rêve:En fin de compte, nous voulons produire un magnifique opéra rock appelé "ATYLANTOS" qui est l'idée de l'auteur- compositeur, Jean-Patrick CAPDEVIELLE. story:
YA VIENE EL TERCER ÁLBUM DE EL TERRIBLE TARANTISMO (MASAJE TURCO)

 

COMO YA SABEN HEMOS PRODUCIDO DOS ÁLBUMES EN CONDICIONES MUY DIFÍCILES, Y ESTA VEZ QUEREMOS HACERLO SIN ROBAR UN BANCO Y SIN LASTIMAR A NADIE.

 

EL TERCER ÁLBUM YA TIENE 12 CANCIONES LISTAS PARA GRABAR. LO QUE HACE FALTA ES ENTRAR EL ESTUDIO POR UN LARGO RATO; MUCHOS ENSAYOS PARA ARREGLARLAS Y QUE SUENEN A LA PERFECCIÓN PARA AHÍ Y SEGUIR ADELANTE A GRABARLAS. PARA ESTE PROYECTO NECESITAMOS DE SU APOYO, HACERLO ES TAN SIMPLE COMO ORDENAR SU COPIA CON ANTERIORIDAD.

¿QUE TIENE ESTE ÁLBUM?

ESTE ÁLBUM TIENE 9 COMPOSICIONES NUEVAS EN EL ESTILO DEL TARANTISMO QUE YA CONOCEN, MEZCLANDO MÚSICA BALCÁNICA CON REGGAE, SWING Y SABOR LATINO. Y 3 ARREGLOS QUE YA ESCUCHARON EN NUESTROS CONCIERTOS, QUEDARON MUY ESPECIALES Y VALEN LA PENA PARA GRABARLAS Y METERLAS EN EL ÁLBUM.

¿CÓMO LLEGAMOS ACÁ?

TENEMOS UNA HISTORIA LARGA DE HEROÍSMO, ALTRUISMO, TRAICIÓN, CRIMEN Y VIOLENCIA. PUEDEN VERLO TODO EN DETALLE EN NUESTRO VIDEO. FORMAMOS LA BANDA TOCANDO EN LAS CALLES DE BOGOTÁ, UNIENDO MUNDOS DEL NORTE Y DEL SUR, OFRECIENDO NUESTRA MÚSICA GRATIS A GENTE DE TODAS PARTES. VIEJOS EN SILLAS DE RUEDAS Y NIÑOS EN COCHES, BANQUEROS Y HABITANTES DE CALLE POR IGUAL.

EN ESTA TRAYECTORIA DE UN AÑO Y MEDIO, YA HEMOS PRODUCIDO UN NUEVO ÁLBUM CON LA AYUDA DE ESTUDIANTES DE UNIVERSIDAD DE SAN BUENAVENTURA. TODO HECHO EN DOS DÍAS DE GRABACIÓN RÁPIDA, YA QUE ANTES DE TANTO VIAJE Y TANTO AFÁN LOGRAMOS REALIZAR DOS ÁLBUMES QUE A LA GENTE DE BOGOTÁ LE GUSTÓ TANTO QUE COMPRARON MÁS DE DIEZ MIL COPIAS. Y POR ESTA RAZÓN QUEREMOS REALIZAR NUESTRO TERCER ÁLBUM QUE QUEDARÁ MUCHO MEJOR PORQUE USTEDES LO MERECEN.

 

The 3rd album of El Terrible Tarantismo is almost here (TURKISH MASSAGE)

As you know, we have produced 2 albums already. But this time we want to make an even better job and finance it without resorting to a life of crime.

The third album has 12 tracks ready to be recorded. What is needed is time to go to studio, arrange them well until they sound perfect and go ahead and record them. For this, we need your support. No donation, no nothing. Easily done by ordering a copy of the album and be the first to listen to it when it comes ou

What is in the album?

This album has 9 original compositions never recorded before in the rare style of Tarantismo mixing the balkans, reggae, swing and latin feel. And 3 arrangements that we already have been playing in our concerts that are very special and ours that we decided to put them in the album.

How did we end up here?

We have a long history of heroics, altruism, treachery, crime and violence. You can see all of it in our short-documentary soon to be released. We formed the band playing on the streets of Bogota. Bringing together worlds normally far apart. Playing for the old in wheelchairs and the young in prams, bankers and hobos alike.

This adventure of a year and a half, we already produced one new album with help of sound engineering students all done in two days of studio time. More than 10.000 copies of that CD was sold this year. So this time we want to sit down, take our time and make an even better album because you deserve it! (we deserve to sit down a bit too!)

Bringing together worlds normally far apart. Playing for the old in wheelchairs and the young in prams, bankers and hobos alike.
This adventure of a year and a half, we already produced one new album with help of sound engineering students all done in two days of studio time. More than 10.000 copies of that CD was sold this year. So this time we want to sit down, take our time and make an even better album because you deserve it! (we deserve to sit down a bit too!)

story:
I'm Kev Nolan, an Indie Folk Rock singer songwriter from Brisbane Australia. For me this project is incredibly important. This is my second incarnation as a musician. Fate has delivered me a second opportunity to express myself musically. In my mid 20s, my dream seemed to just slip away. As a mature adult I'm focussed on delivering my art.

I'm inviting people to come on the journey with me. Watch my "Acoustic Series" & see these 10 songs develop through the production stage with the help of my Producer Alex Berserker. Be part of the making of  a work of art to be know as "Heart's In The Ground" - my second album.

Be part of the making of  a work of art to be know as "Heart's In The Ground" - my second album.

story:
ABOUT THE RECORD

Air Itself is a personal, intimate sounding record. It’s hard not to describe it, by comparison with recent releases, as a solo album - and yet, this is far from the truth. The LP’s sound was very much coloured and shaped by collaboration with musicians and friends. I think it's amongst the best work I've done and i want to share it with as many people as I can.

Air Itself was recorded by Dorian Taywood in a former stable, now underground club/cinema next to the S Bahn line in the former east of Berlin. We mixed it there, at my place and in an old farm house out east towards the Polish border.

Unlike my last full length LP here acoustic instruments - starting with the nylon and steel string guitar - prevail. Nonetheless it’s hard to call Air Itself a strictly acoustic record. I was looking for an ambient, immersive sound world to place these songs into - and through some strange and circuitous process of experimentation and collaboration I found it.

You can stream some of the new unmastered tracks here: https://soundcloud.com/guydale

I'll be writing more about the songs on the LP, the recording process and the people involved in the BLOG over the coming weeks HERE WHERE YOU CAN ALSO STREAM NEW MATERIAL RELEASED WEEK BY WEEK THROUGHOUT THE CAMPAIGN.

THEE AND ME

My name is Guy Dale. I'm a British artist and songwriter based in Berlin. I’ve been writing, recording and performing as Mute Swimmer for 8 years thereabouts. My music has been played on the BBC (UK), Radio Tres (Spain) and Byte FM (Germany). Over the last six years I’ve played over 400 concerts throughout Europe releasing two full length albums and five EPs.

It seems that I've been lucky enough to write a few songs that people seem to find memorable or moving and, through the recordings and the numerous tours,  I’ve been able to reach a small but dedicated audience that allow me to continue making music independently. The chances are that if you’ve arrived on this page and if you’ve read this far - you’re one of those people. Perhaps you came to a concert, signed up to the mailing list or bought one of my previous records. Thanks. I hope this campaign, like the last, will allow my songs to reach the ears of new listeners as well. If you’re one of those people - welcome.

PRE-ORDER

The Air Itself album is recorded, mixed and ready. I’m asking you to support the record in advance of it’s production on Vinyl and CD. Simply put, by pre-ordering the LP, not only do you get to own it, you enable me to make it (physical). If you are in a position to support the project further than the basic pre-order - that is wonderful and it significantly helps the cause. I’ve come up with a number of incentives for that purpose.

  • a unique hand assembled special edition copy of the album on LP or CD. These are exclusive and only available through this site during the campaign
  • a private/live performance anywhere of your choosing (travel costs might need to be covered as well)
  • the opportunity for you to collaborate on and commission new Mute Swimmer music.

WHY CROWDFUND?

By appealing to and offering my music to you directly I’ve found it’s possible (and incredibly gratifying) to operate outside of the 'music industry’. You’ll probably already know that I don’t make mainstream music, I don’t work with a big record label or have a PR team or major media backing. As a small independent artist I make the best work I can with as much integrity and creative endeavour as I’m able. I know the audience I’ve acquired over the years come to my music because of that and I believe they understand and value the exchange as much as I do. By doing it this way I diminish the risk of financial ruin and it allows those of you who want to hear more of my music do so in a very effective, creative and direct way.

WHAT’S THE FUNDING FOR EXACTLY?

By supporting the album this way you will ensure that:

  • the record is professionally mastered - so whether it’s played on your turntable, your radio or your smart phone, it will sound as good as it possibly can when it reaches you.
  • I can (metaphorically or otherwise) hand you the record as a physical object that endures - as a piece of vinyl or a CD. I’m old fashioned like that and I know I’m not alone.
  • the record comes in a package that ties together the themes, mood and texts of the songs as beautifully and thoughtfully as possible - anyone familiar with my background as a visual artist will know that I take great pleasure in creating a visual concept around the music.

 

THE MATHS

€600 professional mastering and coding for LP, CD and digital release.

€2000 Production of 12” Vinyl LPs with artwork, lyric sheet and packaging.

€900 Production of CDs with artwork, lyric sheet and packaging.

Any funds raised above the target will of course be most welcome. I would like to give this money to the musicians and engineers that worked on the project and gave their valuable time for free.

Aside from your direct contribution to the campaign the best thing you can possibly do for me and this record  is to copy the link above and share it with lots of people you think would like to hear it. So even if you can't afford to contribute you can ably support it and it's much appreciated.

story:
Ben Meech New Album

Read about the project:

  • Ben Meech is a singer / Song writer from England
  • This album is a joint work with Kilya Vogel Buira and it's just damned important to do justice to the new songs.
  • If you help, then you might just change the world! This album will be UNIQUE - a really beautiful collection of songs

What We Need & What You Get

  • The €2500 + will all go into the professional production.
  • Everyone who donates will receive a copy of the CD. THose who donate more than €20 will receive personal favours!
  • All funds (even if we don't reach out goal) can still be used for the album recording...it'll just take a lot longer!

The Impact

  • These songs are all new, and we're very proud of them
  • This will be the third album to date - the first fully professionally recorded one!
  • If you have any questions please send a mail to benmeech@posteo.net, I'll write back!

Risks & Challenges

  • The risk is always there when you live from music.
  • You have to believe 100% in what you do..and others too!

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Spread the campaign. Every person who contributes €20 gets a free CD!
  • There are tools to share the campaign on the crowd funding website - but call people, mail them etc!

story:
Album Features

  • The theme of the album is based on the concept of Truth, to reflect the name of our group - Axiom.  Each track on the album contains the thread to the idea of Truth or lack of Truth. 
  • A unified sound with specially written transitions between each track, with one song morphing into the next. To achieve these effects, we are working with only one composer and arranger, Karl Blench.
  • The Album will be a cohesive single work rather than a collection of songs. The end of the album will transition to the beginning creating endless listening pleasure. 
  • We are excited to release our album with Parma Recordings, one of the finest labels in the record industry. PARMA will also release our album on Navona and will be distributed by Naxos. 
  • We will be working on the album in one of the best studios in Houston - Wire Road Studios, with engineer Andrew Bradley, who has decades of experience with the world’s best musicians, and some of the best equipment in town.

 

Track List

To whet your appetite for this exciting album even more, here is the list of songs you’ll hear:

  1. Haywyre, “Insight”
  2. Claudio Monteverdi, “Pur Ti Miro”
  3. Fleetwood Mac, “Little Lies”
  4. Charles Ives, “The Alcotts”
  5. Elliott Smith, “Everything Means Nothing to Me”
  6. Karl Blench, Original composition, title TBA
  7. Billie Holiday, “Don't Explain”
  8. Johann Sebastian Bach, “Erbarme dich”
  9. Bob Dylan/Old Crow Medicine Show, “Wagon Wheel”

This album is only the beginning of really big things to come in our next five years. Join us in making this album, and you can tell all your friends about how you "knew Axiom when..."

 

Critical Acclaim

"The Axiom Quartet™ has become a fixture on Houston's classical music scene. It was the concerts the quartet played at the Cave Without a Name that became the model for the kind of programs the group likes to present - shorter pieces between five and 10 minutes in length. 'We were the very first strictly classical ensemble to play [at the Cave],' Moore says. 'And every time we go out there we have a fully sold-out cave.'"~ Houston Chronicle

"I LOVE These Guys/Gals!! Wanted them for my Daughter's wedding/Shower, but the dates didn't work out! I Get to hear them on Wed. At the Airport!! They are Passionate, Current, and Wonderful!!!" ~ Tracey

“We just wanted to express our delight and appreciation for the thoughtfulness of your concert mix. As non-musicians the selection of pieces we are not familiar with, sometimes a stretch for us, combined with more contemporary, entertaining numbers, always leaves us wanting to return to your concerts. Also, your obvious delight and courtesy towards each other, coupled with your concern for us by each speaking about the next piece is most helpful. Keep up the good work!” ~ Vic and Dee

 

Use of Funds

  • Cover art design
  • Editing and Producing
  • Licensing
  • Production
  • Sheet music costs
  • Studio recording fees
  • Editing fees
  • Permission to arrange
  • Marketing
  • CD printing
  • CD packaging

 

Who We Are

Axiom Quartet™ is a dynamic and passionate professional ensemble is based in Houston, TX. Celebrating our fifth anniversary of working together, our group is known for creating and performing programs that mix Classical string quartet repertoire, classical transcriptions, new compositions, and popular Rock, Electronic, Indie, Jazz and Pop genres.

This formula has proven successful on a local and semi-national level; our concerts in Houston are frequently sold out, and we have been invited as the first ever classical string ensemble to play at the natural cave (Cave Without A Name) in the Texas Hill Country.

The Axiom Quartet Cave™ concerts are regularly sold out and garner critical acclaim. Recent engagements include a full concert series at the University of St.Thomas Cullen Hall, as well as performances at the Bender Performing Arts Center in Humble, TX and The Smalley Concert Series in La Grange, TX.

 

Meet the Artists

Dominika Dancewicz - Violin
Violinist Dominika Dancewicz is the founding member of Axiom Quartet. As a member of various ensembles she performed on the world’s famous stages: the Berlin Philharmonic, Concertgebouw in Amsterdam, Salle Pleyel in Paris, and Carnegie Hall in NYC. An avid chamber musician, Ms.Dancewicz has played with an array of groups in Europe, Asia and the US. She is also a recital artist and collaborates frequently with pianist Donald Doucet. The Dancewicz-Doucet Duo will be releasing their first album in 2017.

She currently serves as concertmaster for Opera in the Heights in Houston, and is also a member of Chamber Orchestra of San Antonio and Houston Latin Philharmonic. She has performed with the River Oaks Chamber Orchestra, Houston Ballet, Musiqa, Foundation for Modern Music, Opera Vista and Victoria Bach Festival.

Learn more at www.blondviolin.com

Ingrid Gerling - Violin
Dr. Ingrid Hunter, a violinist native of Porto Alegre, Brazil, has performed extensively as a soloist, recitalist, and chamber musician throughout the United States, South America, Europe, and Asia. Her Houston performances include regular appearances as a violinist for Musiqa, the Foundation for Modern Music, DaCamera, and Mercury. Dr. Hunter is the Professor of Violin and Orchestra Director at San Jacinto College Central and the University of St. Thomas, and also maintains a very active private violin studio. 

Nina Bledsoe - Viola
Nina Bledsoe is a passionate performer and skilled teacher. In addition to performing with Axiom, she is currently Adjunct Professor of Viola at Sam Houston State University. Ms. Bledsoe is a fervent and versatile chamber musician. She seeks out creative non-traditional performance opportunities for presenting new music. She champions modern music and has premiered works for string quartet, solo viola, and viola and dance.

Learn more at www.ninabledsoeviola.com

Patrick Moore - Cello
Patrick Moore is a cellist of diverse interests.  In addition to being the cellist for The Axiom Quartet, he also performs with Opera in the Heights, Houston's Latin Philharmonic, and The Chamber Orchestra of San Antonio. 

Patrick is also strong supporter of new music and improvisation and has performed with Aperio, Musiqa, the New Frontier Jazz Orchestra.  

He is a dedicated cello teacher and maintains an active cello studio at the University of St.Thomas and The AFA where he is a faculty member.

Learn more at www.moorecello.com

Karl Blench - Composer & Arranger

Karl Blench is a composer, arranger, and conductor who holds degrees from the University of New Hampshire and Rice University. His music has been performed throughout the United States, Europe, and Cuba by ensembles such as the h2 Saxophone Quartet, the Indianapolis Symphony Orchestra, the Shepherd School Symphony and Chamber Orchestras, and the Universities of Houston and New Hampshire Wind Ensembles. He has been the recipient of the Indianapolis Symphony Prize, and an ASCAP Foundation Morton Gould Young Composer Award. When not writing, Karl can be found stuck in Houston trafﬁc or brewing beer.

FAQs

Why does it take a year to produce an Album?

Short answer, It takes longer than a year to produce an album.  The project all started with a chance meeting with a record executive, Bob Lord of PARMA Recordings, who said "You sound awesome, you should record an album!".  That started 6 months of conversation about what to record.  After months of deciding that Beethoven would be great, but feeling shadows looming largely, Bob Lord reminded us we could record anything.  

That started a 3 month epic battle about what were our favorite songs of all time.  Then we waited another 4 months for permission to arrange the songs to be bestowed upon us.  Then we gave our list to our fabulous composer, Karl Blench, to give us a unique and new voice to our album.  That started a 6 month wait until the arrangements were made along. Then we get to record in the studio over the course of 4-6 weeks. Afterward, our master will be sent to Parma for finishing touches.  6 months later, after many enticing marketing campaigns, our album will be released in the first quarter of 2018. Then you get to listen to it as much as you like.

 

Why a CD and not digital copies?  

While the digital copy gives you the music, the physical cd gives you so much more! Not only do you get the beautiful art work that the adept Parma records designs. But you also receive the artfully crafted liner notes of Houston native author John Grimmett. Axiom knows music and John knows wordsmithing. His narrative will add a new dimension to your listening experience.

Don't miss your chance to be one of the first to own and enjoy the Axiom Quartet's first full-length album. The album is yours, when you choose a perk to the right.

 

Will you have digital copies?  

Yes, once the album is released in 2018.

story:
If you've known me for any amount of time then you know that this recording project has been a long time coming.  Songwriting has been a major part of my life for as long as I can remember...and the time has finally come to produce my very first EP!  This EP, entitled "Honest", is a powerful and eclectic collection of five songs that have been with me for years and fully represent me as a songwriter.  As an artist, there is no greater thrill than that of sharing my craft with you.  These songs and this project both mean the world to me....and your contribution of ANY amount is invaluable to me as an artist as it allows me to share my craft with you.  I sincerely thank you for your consideration!   

The biggest obstacle for any artist...especially the songwriter in today's music business...is financial.  Recording is a very expensive process.  While I have formed a few valuable relationships over the past few months that have helped me get started on this EP...I still need to raise these funds to finish this project.  This is where you come in! 

I've been working with a producer on this project and we've been able to get everything recorded...drums, bass, guitars, vocals, and even a tambourine or two.  I simply need to raise the funds to finish up the recording process and get ready for release.  This includes paying the producer, mixing, mastering, and distribution.  My goal of $6,000 will enable me to pay for all of the above services as well as album art, photos, etc.  Any contribution of $10 or more will get you a free copy of this EP when it comes out...and if you decide to contribute a little more, you can get a free concert at your house!  Feel free to check out the complete list of donation perks.

If you've read this far then it's obvious that music is important to you.  If you're like me...and you probably are...then you believe in music.   This project, like many others like it, is my honest contribution to the world of music.  I chose to do this as an independent artist because I believe in myself and these songs.  This is the purest statement I can make as an artist and it would mean EVERYTHING to me if you could come alongside me and help me make this statement.  The world needs honest music.
 
Thank you very much for contributing to my project.  I am very excited to be able to share this with you and with the world.  If you are unable to contribute at this time...I totally understand!  Please share this campaign with anyone you know that loves music as much as we do.

story:
PURE AXESS

WHY THIS MATTERS

70% of youth stop attending church after they graduate from high school. If you aren’t aware of this phenomenon, our children and grandchildren (born after 1999) are poised to leave the Christian community in record numbers as they grow up. 

One of the reasons why this is happening is because there are very few Christian online platforms and apps that provide the music, sports and entertainment that they love – on the mobile and web platforms that they use every day. 

In the past, Christians have pioneered and leveraged new media so that every person can hear the message of Christ. Today, we have an opportunity to extend that message and engage our youth using the most common platform in the world: the mobile phone.

We want our children and grandchildren to be happy, healthy and whole. With a strong foundation in Christ, they are more likely to make good decisions throughout their lives. If they are not engaged in a positive and constructive way (such as through our mobile app), then they are at risk of finding other outlets that may take them down the wrong road.

THE VISION

With the capital raised through this campaign, we will launch a mobile app offering unique content and experiences to engage this generation of young Christians to come together and enjoy relevant Christian talent and entertainment. 

We are building a connected and interactive Christian community through music, sports, ministry, and beyond. Our vision is for people of all ages to find relevant information and entertainment through this mobile app that will draw their attention, entertain and answer questions they have about their faith. The app will also connect those looking for a church home with Bible-based churches in their local area.

THE NEXT STEP

Great news— we’ve completed the initial version of the app to live-stream music and sports on iPhones. This is completely paid for, and the next phase is to complete the app for iPhones and build a version for Android phones. 

Our $250k fundraising goal will help us finalize the existing iPhone app and adapt the app for Android phones. Beyond that, the funds will go towards creating content for advertising on social media platforms to reach our audience of young adults and teenagers and encourage them to download the app on their phones. This part is critical because of how active this group is across social media platforms such as Facebook, Instagram and Snapchat— they are easily reached on there and therefore more receptive to hearing our message.

A sneak peek of how the app looks:

 

THE POWER OF MUSIC TO REACH YOUTH

Christian and gospel music is one of the fastest-growing areas in recorded music history, according to Business Insider. 

More and more music is being purchased and streamed through mobile devices, and in the digital age, live experiences are more important than ever. Audiences are hungry for singular experiences, and they want to be part of these shared moments. We are adapting to the technology and social media revolution to create a more engaging experience.

As Rick McDonnell at Harmony Passion puts it; “what is it about music that connects people in such diverse areas of life?  I'm sure there are many ways to explain it, but I attribute it to this: that God has placed His image within the heart and mind of man. I believe God is musical, and has given man the ability to use this gift of music. This attribute is universal, not limited by language, culture, or occupation. This is how we can connect to anyone through music."

“Music communicates on a deeper level than any other form of communication— it engages the soul,” says Jason Howard, Amplify's senior associate pastor. “My connection with God began through music when I was a teenager.”

MOBILE - More and more music is being purchased and streamed through mobile devices.      Any experience created must operate on the mobile platform.

  1. THE POWER OF LIVE - In the Age of Digital - Live is more important than ever...Audiences are hungry for singular  experiences. They want to be part of these shared moments.  “Music Fans Want Experiences Over Downloads According to Nielsen Report.” *Sept 2016
  2. BUSINESS MODEL TRANSFORMATION - The future business model needs to adapt to the technology and social media revolution in order to create a more engaging experience.

SCREENSHOTS: These are actual screen shots from the app

 

MUSIC DELIVERY THROUGH THE APP

  • Through our app, we will offer unique events by top Christian artists such as:
  • Live-streamed backstage events before and/or after a live show
  • Live-streamed rehearsals
  • Live-streamed events on the tour bus
  • Live-streamed events with musicians sharing their techniques
  • Special live-streamed events created by the musicians 

 

We will also offer unique videos of top Christian stars sharing their stories, how they came to know Christ and the difference it has made in their lives— including:

  • Christian musicians
  • Christian athletes
  • Christian authors
  • Christian entertainers
  • Christian educators
  • Christian business Leaders

Real life stories of Gen-Z and young Millennials detailing how they came to Christ

We will connect those looking for a church home with bible based churches in their area.

Frequently Asked Questions:

Frequently Asked Questions about Life and Religion:
Through the app, today’s Christian leaders will present video answers to frequently asked questions by youth. Young Christians need their questions addressed by top Christian leaders relatable to their age and stage in life. We are not changing the message, just the medium through which it is delivered.

We will also address topical issues such as:

  • Relationships/Marriage
  • Education
  • Career
  • Fitness
  • Health
  • Trends
  • Issues not listed above that are important to youth

Our focus throughout this app will be to always consider the needs of others and show them what true Christian love and unity is like as we engage with them.

 

PREMIUM MEMBERSHIPS

Our Premium Member program will be killer.  Basic Membership is free and will allow you to access and experience the majority of content on the app.. Simply signup on our App or WebSite and with a Basic Membership you can experience it all. Certain unique live-streamed events will require the purchase of a ticket in order to access and participate in the event.  Not to worry as the fee for these events will only be a few dollars.

Premium Membership offers the very best in Live Streaming Entertainment for one low annual fee or easy monthly payments. In addition Premium Membership gets you:

  • Advance Notice Of Upcoming Live Streaming Events
  • Advance Purchase Of Live Streaming Event Tickets
  • Advance Notice to Purchase Tickets for Upcoming In Person Shows 
  • Discounted Purchase of Live Streaming Event Tickets
  • Discounted Purchase of Archived Live Events
  • Discounted Purchase of Artist Merchandise and Music*
  • Private Event Tickets
  • Entry Into Special Event Giveaways 
  • Special Premium Members only Events
  • Special Giveaways During Live Events For Premium Members Only
  • Discounted PURE AXESS merchandise

*Must Be Approved By Artist

RISKS AND CHALLENGES

Obviously our greatest risk is that we will not reach our funding goal.  Should that happen I will continue to seek ways to fund this app to completion. Our biggest challenge will be to secure the talent needed to attract young people to the app and to continually create new content that will keep them coming back.  

CHARITY

Donating to the causes you care about not only benefits the charities themselves, it can be deeply rewarding for us as well. Millions of people give to charity on a regular basis to support causes they believe in, as well as for the positive effect it has on their own lives.

We believe in Charity.  We will strongly encourage each Christian celebrity involved in AXESS CHRISTIAN to donate a portion of their fees earned through our app to the Christian Charity of their choice.  During certain live streamed events users will have the opportunity to donate a few $$ to their chosen charity if they so choose.  In addition a portion our our $$ will also go to a Christian charity.  Each time you sign up for a paid event a portion of your $$ will go to charity.  Keep in mind most of the fees for events will be just a few dollars but it all adds up.  Our Charities will be listed on our website and our app.

As Martin Luther so eloquently put it: "Christian life consists in faith and charity"

 

TO SUMMARIZE

My name is Mark McVey.  My wife Madeleine and I have 5 awesome children and 7 perfect grandchildren.  At least we think so.  Their parents may not agree at times.

I spent the better part of 40 years in the business world.  Prior to starting my own medical company in 1992  which I was in the finance industry.  After almost 25 years growing my company I felt a new calling.  I transitioned into the ministry with the local church I attended.   I  love my church and I love the ministry but I still felt a calling that was greater and I transitioned my ministry this year and set out to see what God had in mind for me.  I was only good at a few things, I love the Lord, I love people and I know business.  How can I combine these to impact His kingdom?  Only a few months later I began the journey to PURE AXESS.

My wife and I lead a Young Adult Group at our church and we have become passionate about making a difference in the lives of young Christians and those window shopping.  My prayer is that others will be as passionate as I am about the mission of this app.

So here we are.  You know my story and the story behind PURE AXESS.   I guess the best way to summarize this is let you know right up front that building an app is not in my wheel house, not even close.  So I have been blessed with a team of experts who do what they do best, build a killer app and offer me the best possible technical, professional and spiritual advice.  Here is a little background on our team:

The Development Team behind AXESS CHRISTIAN has developed and published some of the biggest video game franchises in the world, with lifetime sales of over $6.5 billion worldwide.

Our Advisory Team has extensive global expertise in building brands, platforms, programs and partnerships in sports, media and entertainment. 

Our Talent Development Partner is a 45 + year veteran of the international entertainment industry.  Based in Nashville Tennessee, he has worked in all areas of entertainment, and has worked in various capacities for a long list of dignitaries and recording artists from around the world. 

I saved my most special adviser for last.  Some of you know him very well and all of you have at least heard of Him.  He goes by many names but I call him Heavenly Father.  As Paul puts it, “God is able to make all grace abound to you, so that having all sufficiency in all things at all times, you may abound in every good work” (2 Cor. 9:8). God doesn’t call us to something only to leave us to fend for ourselves. He is with us, he provides for us, and he enables us to finish the assignment.

If we reach our goal of $250,000 it will allow us to properly launch this app and allow us the resources to take it World Wide.  But this is only the beginning.  If we exceed our goal this will allow us to move to begin future experiences.  

It is my belief that through this app we can reach and engage the next generation of Christians.  I pray that you will join me on this mission.  Lets build this thing and then see what God can do with it.  And as one of my favorite teaching pastors say s and I paraphrase, "help us to make Jesus famous".

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

To all of you who help us achieve our goal I am eternally grateful.  But there are additional ways that you can help.  Please help us get the word out to your family, friends, churches, businesses and social media.  You know how compound interest works in finance, well this works the same way.  If you send this to 5 people who send it to 5 people who send it to 5 people, well you get where I am going.  

Thank you for your time and blessings to each of you.

Mark  McVey

Email or call me if you have any questions. (602) 568-8878, markm@pureaxess.com.

story:
Short Summary

  • I am Avalon Penrose, and I am a singing storyteller. I tell my personal stories through songs. 
  • Creating this album is the most important thing in the world to me. I have worked so hard writing these songs for the past several months, and I finally feel like I understand "what" I am and why I am doing it. I am a comedian baby, and I want to share my stories!
  • I want this shit to be as important to other people as it is to me. I want teenagers and adults alike to watch my videos, listen to my songs, and hear my stories. I want people to laugh at them, but also connect with them and realize that each song has a message behind the comedy. My songs and stories do not shy away from sensitive personal subjects that I hope can help people realize they can laugh and cry about tough things in their life all at the same time. 

What I Need

  • I need studio space.
  • I need session musicians, and they deserve money for their time and talents!!
  • I need mixing & mastering.
  • I need to distribute and market my album.
  • I need a quality film crew and film equipment to make the best first music video I can.

Other Ways You Can Help

  • Please feel free to share this with friends and share about it on social media!! 
  • If you have/are any of the above things that I need, please feel free to message me. I am so open to working with anyone who is interested in helping out as a producer or as a PA or anything!!

I wiped my social media, but will be posting again as soon as this ball gets rolling. 

You can follow me on Instagram here: instagram.com/avalonpenrose

& my YouTube channel is here: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC3ak8cQ-muGb00...

story:
A NEW EXCITING SOUND

 

We are Nebula Rosa, an indie band from New Orleans, LA that specializes in making music for your ears and your feet!  Our music is bilingual in English and Spanish and our influences represent the cross-cultural beauty of living in the Americas.

The band traces its beginnings in 2014 to songwriting sessions between George Elizondo and Josh Starkman, two musicians from two different areas of the New Orleans music scene. The collaboration has yielded a beautiful blend of styles stemming from the two songwriters cultural backgrounds. In our music you can hear a variety of influences from Classic and Psychedelic Rock, Pop, Funk, Trova and various Latin American Grooves. With the addition of Robin Sherman on bass and Isaac Eady on drums, the band has become a tighter knit songwriting outfit and a complete band.


NEBULA ROSA MATTERS!


We represent the changing cultural climates of the United States and world. The band represents diversity and acceptance as well as inter-cultural prosperity for all people. Your contribution to Nebula Rosa is a vote for progress, diversity, and acceptance. Because of this we feel our music needs to be heard by as many people as possible. And in order to do that, we’re making an album! We need YOU to get it out there!

 

QUESTION: Why do we need your donation?

 

Your donation will help Nebula Rosa with the production and release of our debut album entitled Begala. We sincerely believe in the power of our music and we believe you will, too. All contributions will go to fund the expenses tied with making Bengala.

 

That includes: mixing and mastering costs for the album, album artwork, copyright costs, album packaging, release of the album (with help from our friends Bubble Bath Records), an amazing music video for our single “Babaduka,” and all other marketing costs through an established media company.

 

OUR GOAL IS $8K… and every donation matters

 

If you are not able to contribute much or anything at all, have no fear! You can still help us by following us on all social media platforms (@nebularosaband) and sharing this campaign with your friends and loved ones. Even if the goal is not met, all donations will be used to fulfill the cost described. And If you've read to this point, thanks!! You win!!

story:
Hi, I'm a folk singer from Kingston, ON.

I started playing and writing music when I was about 14. I've played in rock bands, blues bands, and even a fairly bad punk band, but my acoustic guitar and performing as a solo artist has always been my staple. I play somewhere around 100 shows a year these days. After 25 years of performing and writing music, it's finally time to put out an album.

Sure, I recorded a couple of tapes in high school, but they are mostly lost and awful. So, for all intents and purposes, this is my first album.  And I'm crazy excited to get it done and into your ears. 

I'm not a prolific songwriter, but I try to write 'em well. Most of these songs have been tested in front of hundreds of audiences, either solo or with one of my bands (Strung Out To Dry or The Goodnight Irenes). That said, I'm too close to the songs, so I asked one of Kingston's best and hardest working musicians, Tom Savage, to produce this record. I was immediately impressed with Tom's work as producer of Al Duquette's solo album last year, and I asked him right away if he'd like to be a part of it. Tom really has a fantastic ear for these songs, sometimes bringing them exactly where I wanted them, other times pushing them in exciting new directions.

About the album and this campaign

As you probably know, any musician can record their songs pretty much anywhere, what with computers and all. But it often doesn't sound very good. So, seeing as I've waited over 20 years to do this, I want you to think it's a great folk album. That's why I have a great producer, a great engineer, and some incredible backing musicians. About half the songs were recorded at the beautiful North of Princess Studio, the others at Kevin Bowers' studio nearby. I also have plans to do a music video, and some merch, both of which are firsts for me!  

All told, it's going to cost about $3500. My goal with this campaign is to sell as many records in advance as possible. I've worked hard and put together a great team to make an album that I'm extremely proud of, and I'm excited for you to be a part of this musical journey with me.  PLUS, all of the perks over $10 for this campaign come with an exclusive outtake that will only be available to backers. You can also follow along here for videos from some of the recording sessions.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you aren't able to contribute now, please follow along anyway, share with your friends on social media, and help spread the word! I'll be posting regular updates with some footage from the studio, as well as details on the CD release concert, merch availability, and more. Thank you!

story:
Check out the audio clips on Soundcloud here...

Intro

My name's Alex and I produce deep, electronic music. It has been described as cinematic, vast, epic, emotional and many other things. Musically it sits somewhere between dub, drum & bass, ambient, dub-techno, downtempo, chill out, post dubstep, deep techno and bass.

I have spent around 10 years making and releasing music. First under the alias DFRNT, and now under the name Stillhead. As DFRNT, there were 4 albums, 20 or so EPs, stacks of remixes and compilation appearances alongside my Echodub and Cut labels

In 2013, I decided that I wanted to make a shift in my production work. I wanted to focus less on releasing in quantity, and focus more on releasing quality. Tracks that I could stand behind for years, and tracks that I wouldn't get sick of by the time they had been released (the release process can sometimes take months). Stillhead (and a new label: Brightest Dark Place) was born.

With Stillhead I have tried very carefully to release quality over quantity, and as a result it's been almost 2 years since I released my debut album "Iceberg". It's about a year since my last EP (the Spiders EP), and to date, there have only been a handful of remixes, a few compilation appearances, and aside from a short film soundtrack, not much else.

Copenhagen

The time has come, however, to release another collection of tracks. This time produced around and during the time I spent in the Danish capital city, Copenhagen.

It seemed fitting to give the album the name "Copenhagen", and the release will serve as something of a catalogue of my time there. I'd almost call it a tribute, but I'm not sure I can do the city justice with my humble productions.

New Original Tracks

I have created 10 brand new, previously unheard original Stillhead tracks, including a collaboration with a new Estonian vocalist, a track with previous collaborator and woozy rap aficionado Mu Vonz, and a track co-written and produced with a good friend and recent father Lee Chapman.

 

Remixes

Not content with just a single disc's worth of audio, I have also sourced remixes from some of the producers who I really respect and enjoy right now. These include Bop, Hatti Vatti, Versa, Tonik Ensemble, Mr. Roque, Another Channel, Other Spectrum and Generate.

Alongside these remixes, I have also provided a couple of alternate versions and re-edits of my own to round out the package.

All in all, it's a 20-track offering, which I hope fills people's ears, minds and hearts.

The Release

My first album, Iceberg felt like it went a little under the radar. Working with a different label, it became a vinyl and digital only affair, and I had hoped to be able to press it onto CD too. Unfortunately due to circumstances out-with my control, the plug was pulled on the CD side of things, and I felt the rug had been pulled a little from under my feet. Not anybody's fault, just an unfortunate situation. I felt like I had lost too much control over the project.

Incidentally, check it out on Spotify here!

As a result, I'm keen to release my second album on my own label, and retain as much control over the project as I can.

Self-releasing is something I like to encourage, and having successfully managed to do it in the past with a DFRNT album and a Cut compilation, I'm giving this another go, with the added bonus of being able to take the mistakes I've learned with those other funding campaigns and learn from them this time.

What I'm hoping for is to be able to raise enough contributions to launch the album in a way that I'd like, on a format that I want.

Investment & Process

I have already invested a stack of my time and money into the project. The artwork has been drafted, the original tracks completed and the remixes are being finished as I type this.

The next step is to send everything for mastering and to confirm the initial format (CD most likely).

After that I'll be able to order a limited run of the product (probably 100 to begin with).

After completing the artwork and getting the masters compiled and sent off, I'll be able to order the run of prints that I'd like to go with the album.

I'm also keen to add as many additional extras as possible to the project, so depending on how much support and contributions I get, I'm also considering vinyl, USB sticks with sample packs and project files, extra remixes and some other potential swag.

What You Get

Those who contribute will get as much as I can feasibly afford to give. This isn't a money-making exercise for me, it's about getting the music out there, making the most of the album and in a sense, making things a little easier on my wallet.

Doing the crowd-funding thing allows me to essentially take pre-orders for the album, and then I can worry a little less about the remix fees, mastering costs, artwork, pressing, distribution, promo and packaging costs (which is conservatively looking like a couple of grand, but could be closer to 3 or 4 grand if there is enough interest)

The perks I've got on offer are hopefully enticing enough to convince you that this is a worthwhile project, but it's not really about that for me. I'm happy to make sure you all get your money's worth, but I imagine that those who contribute are doing it more out of support, and appreciation for my work and for unsigned artists, than because they need a new CD for their collection.

Most of you will probably stream the album on Spotify or listen via downloaded mp3. That's completely fine, but of course, being able to even shift 50 of 100 CDs would be brilliant.

To know there are even 50 people out there who appreciate my music and what I'm creating is really an honour, and I hope that I can connect with every single one of you in some way, at some point in the future.

Risks

As for risks with the project, well, there aren't any (aside from the fact that it could completely flop, I guess). The more support I get, the better the end product will be, but if I get nothing, then the project will still go ahead, just in a cut-down format.

The album will still be released, but the CDs might just be more regular, there is less likely to be a run of prints, or vinyl, or any special promo surrounding the release. It'll just slip out like a whisper on the wind.

So...

If you can spare a few quid, a couple of bucks, some euros, a yen or two, the odd ruble or whatever your national denomination is then of course that will be gratefully received. If you want to splash a bit more, then please do - I could use all the help I can get.

That said, if you can't afford to contribute, then I completely understand, and if you have the time or energy, then you can help me by sharing the campaign, telling anybody you think might be interested or just giving me a few shouts on social media to help spread the word.

I look forward to getting this thing off the ground and keeping you updated along the way. I also hope that I have perhaps inspired you in some way to contribute, or to at least share this with a friend who might.

Thanks again everyone!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Jay, I was born in Northern New Jersey. I've had some troubles, but decided that rather than being ashamed of it, I'd embrace and write music to try and connect with other people who maybe grew up depressed or feeling hopeless. Music was never the plan, but it kept creeping into the background until I had no choice but to embrace it. I hope that if you know me, my music can tell the story better than I can. And if you don't, I hope something resonates with you.

What We Need & What You Get

Every hour of recording is usually 100 dollars. A friend of a friend is willing to record for half of that. Mixing is usually 150-300 a song. To record a song, under perfect conditions, will stay take nearly a full day of recording. I'm hoping to be able to rent the studio for a week, record 8 songs, have them mixed, mastered, and begin playing shows around Los Angeles, and eventually the country. I have some solid people in my corner, I simply need to record this album. Any leftover money will help with living expenses, as I quite literally am putting everything I have into this. 

The Impact

I don't believe there's a sincere voice in music to represent the disenfranchised, marginalized, forgotten folks of this generation, the next, or the last. There's been a lot of bad times, but I think I've found a way to translate those struggles into something beautiful.

Risks & Challenges

I will probably end up living in my car-- blissful, happy, and content. All I want is for my music to have integrity, I don't very much care about anything else right now.

Other Ways You Can Help

Share this campaign, donate if you can, and definitely look forward to new music coming very soon. Thank you, lots of love, and all the best to each of you. Also, feel free to reach out if you or someone you know is struggling.. I'll do my best to help..
